MajorClaims.MC1: human needs for farmland, housing and industry are more important
MajorClaims.MC2: human needs for farmland, housing and industry are more important

Claims.C2: the needs for farmland, housing and industry are more important
Claims.C3: farmland, housing and industry can satisfy the desire of human that living a better life
Claims.C4: it can do good to protect the endangered animals

Premises.P1: land used for farmland, housing and industry can benefit more to the whole society
Premises.P2: the economy of the whole society will be developed with the help of agriculture, real estate industry and industry, in particularly industry which is the pillar industry of national economy
Premises.P4: the society will be stable and harmony due to more farmland and industry
Premises.P5: more farmlands and industries can provide more job opportunities which can decrease the unemployment rate and crime rate
Premises.P6: farming, housing and industry provide us the food we eat, place we live, clothes we wear, which are essential to live
Premises.P7: Especially in some poor areas, survival is the most significant thing
Premises.P8: highly developed agriculture and industry can improve our living conditions which allow us have a good quality life
Premises.P9: farmland, housing and industry will occupy the land used for endangered animals
Premises.P10: agriculture and industry make a contribution to the economy
Premises.P11: we can have more advanced methods to take care of endangered animals
Premises.P12: we can invent new technique to help endangered animals to produce offspring to be sure they would not distinct
